item.title: EP 939 - The Yara-Ma-Yha-Who: A Cryptid Who Will Swallow You Whole!
item.itunes:title: The Yara-Ma-Yha-Who: A Cryptid Who Will Swallow You Whole!
item.description:
Today we take a look at a controversial studying involving SSRIs and depression, and then we travel to Australia hunt the bizarre cryptid known as the Yara-Ma-Yha-Who.

 

Patreon 

https://www.patreon.com/user?u=18482113

PayPal Donation Link

https://tinyurl.com/mrxe36ph

MERCH STORE!!!

https://tinyurl.com/y8zam4o2

Amazon Wish List

https://www.amazon.com/hz/wishlist/ls/28CIOGSFRUXAD?ref_=wl_share

 

Help Promote Dead Rabbit!

Dual Flyer

https://i.imgur.com/OhuoI2v.jpg

"As Above" Flyer

https://i.imgur.com/yobMtUp.jpg

“Alien Flyer” By TVP VT U

https://imgur.com/gallery/aPN1Fnw

 

Links:

Little evidence that chemical imbalance causes depression, UCL scientists find

https://www.theguardian.com/society/2022/jul/20/scientists-question-widespread-use-of-antidepressants-after-survey-on-serotonin

Study on serotonin and depression sparks fierce debate

https://www.france24.com/en/live-news/20220811-study-on-serotonin-and-depression-sparks-fierce-debate

Depression isn’t caused by a chemical imbalance, but antidepressants like SSRIs are still effective

https://bigthink.com/health/depression-antidepressants-ssris/

Serotonin or Not, Antidepressants Work

https://www.psychiatrictimes.com/view/serotonin-or-not-antidepressants-work

Mass Shootings and SSRI Meds Claims—What We Do Know, What We Don't

https://www.newsweek.com/mass-shootings-ssri-meds-claimswhat-we-do-know-what-we-dont-1722549

Yara-ma-yha-who

https://abookofcreatures.com/2015/06/17/yara-ma-yha-who/

Yara Ma Yha Who

https://cryptidz.fandom.com/wiki/Yara_Ma_Yha_Who

Yara-ma-yha-who

https://pantheon.org/articles/y/yara-ma-yha-who.html

 

Listen to the podcast wherever you listen to podcasts!
